name: Dungeon Warrior 4 (campotech)
description:
DUNGEON WARRIOR 4DUNGEON WARRIOR 4DUNGEON WARRIOR 4 DUNGEON WARRIOR 4

In the epic conclusion of the Dungeon Warrior series a knight name David finds a young woman name Su who has to protect her from an evil empire ruled by the evil Donavon. David and his childhood friends Kyle and William join together to fight the evil empire and help Su get back home to her dimension.

Changeable Classes

As you progress through the game you will find Job Crystals that will allow you to change classes at any time in the game. 

Crafting System

You must buy or find materials to forge different items, weapons and armor. But beware the stronger the weapon and armor is the harder it will be to forge.

4 Different Endings

Depending on how you play the game they're 4 different endings to your epic adventure.

10 hours of gameplay

With over 10 hours of game there is no telling what awaits you in this grand adventure as you play through not only 1 world but 2 worlds.
